DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate a treatment result of every two months versus as needed (PRN) after 3 initial monthly intravitreal aflibercept for the Japanese age related macular degeneration.
DOC.brief_title: Study of PRN and Every 2months Intravitreal Aflibercept for Age Related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of agerelated macular degeneration Any treatment before intravitreal Aflibercept for agerelated macular degeneration. Visual acuity above 0.1 in decimal visual acuity
